description: The 2016 #everynewmoon adventure took us to Lesotho, the mountain Kingdom. This image was taken at a rock quarry on top of one of the mountains as the Milky Way sets early in the evening. About the photo: Canon 5D MkIII Canon 24-70mm LII Shot at: ISO3200 24mm F/2,8 25 Sec A great light to use for these type of shots: Fenix CL25R Lantern in moonlight mode. Processing in Lightroom and Photoshop. PhotographingSpace.com Milky Way Finishers Action Pack used to finish off final editing of clarity, star reduction and noise reduction. Check it out: photographingspace.com/product/milkywayfinisher/ Want to know more about my workflow to edit Milky Way image? Hereâ€™s how I finish off my astro photos: photographingspace.com/finish-milky-way/ Follow me on Instagram: www.instagram.com/astrotanja/ Twitter: twitter.com/astrotanja
title: EveryNewMoon Lesotho
